constituency.translation[0].definitions[: an area of a country that elects a representative to a parliament
He represents the Essex constituency of Epping Forest.
the people who live and vote in a particular area
In this meaning, constituency is usually followed by a singular verb
The constituency seems happy with its MP
The constituency seem happy with their MP
any group that supports or is likely to support a politician or a political party
The trade unions were no longer the constituency of the Labour Party alone.
